de.weltraumschaf.commons.system
Interface ExitCode

public interface ExitCode

Defines an exit code. Usually you will implement this interface from an enum: public enum ExitCodeImpl implements ExitCode { OK(0), ERROR(1), FATAL(-1); private final int code; public ExitCodeImpl(final int code) { this.code = code; } @Override public int getCode() [ return code; } }

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

Method Summary
 int getCode()
          Returns the integer representation of the exit code.
 

Method Detail

getCode

int getCode()
Returns the integer representation of the exit code. A integer of 0 means everything ok. Everything else signals an erroneous exit code.

Returns:
Return integer.
